Let me show you how to make a
delicious and simple spaghetti with tuna.

and you don't know what to do after that.

perhaps with boiled eggs, perhaps have it
like salad, but actually you can really

minute. What do you need? You need 1 clove

of garlic, which you slice quite
roughly sliced. Why I do that? Because if

incase don't want that much garlic, 
you can always remove. Then you

get a chili, you break them in a half,
you don't use them all, and you smell it.
